321b5(mdo sde): ste/ bcu po de dag ni lAm sbyin pa'i phan yon no// snod sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na// 'dzi garten gyi yon tan gyi snod lta bur 'gyur ba dang / mdog
321b6(mdo sde): snum par 'gyur ba dang / sems kyi rgyud mnyen par 'gyur ba dang / skom par mi 'gyur ba dang / skom na yang chu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / yi dag su skye bar mi 'gyur
321b7(mdo sde): ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang / mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu pa
321b8(mdo sde): de dag ni snod sbyin pa'i phan yon no// kha zas sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / stobs dang ldan
322a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / dran pa dang ldan zhing / spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bag tsha ba med par 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba dang / 'khor bdun par
322a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi rnams 'dun zhing / dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mtho risu skye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dag
322a3(mdo sde): ni kha zas sbyin pa'i phan yon no// bzhon pa sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang na na/ rkang pa shin tu gzhon par 'gyur ba dang / rkang pa shin tu gnas par
322a4(mdo sde): 'gyur pa dang / rkang pas 'gro na lus ngal bar mi la gyur pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang / mi mdza 'a ba mang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
322a5(mdo sde): pa rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bzhon pa rnam sa kyis brel bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rami gro byed pa dang / mi ldan par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtho risu skye bar 'gyur ba
322a6(mdo sde): dang / myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni bzhon pa sbyin pa'i phan yor no// gnas sbyin pa'i phan yon rab tu mang ste/ mang po gang zhe no// de la 'jigs
322a7(mdo sde): pa mi 'byung ngo // gding ba dang / bgo ba shin tu 'jam po rnyed par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi rnams kyi 'dod pa'i phan yon lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod de ma la
322a8(mdo sde): kye ma bdag rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu'i khyim du skye bar gyur cig/ ce 'am/ bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu'i khyim du skye bar gyur cig ces 'am/ khyim bdag
322b1(mdo sde): shing sa la chen po lta bu'i khyim du skye bar gyur cig ce na/ de'i smon pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod de kye ma bdag grong gi gtso bor gyur cig ce 'am/ grong khyer gyi
322b2(mdo sde): gtso bor gyur cig ce 'am/ grong rdal gyi ga tso bor gyur cig ce'am/ ri bregs kyi rgyal por gyur cig ce'am/ rgyal phran du gyur cig ce'am/ rgyal po btsan par gyur
322b3(mdo sde): cig ce 'am/ de'i smon pa de de bzhin du grub par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod de gling gcig gi rgyal por gyur cig ce 'am/ gling gnyis kyi rgyal por gyur cig ce'am/ gling
322b4(mdo sde): gsum gyi rgyal por gyur cig ce'am/ 'khor los sgyu ba'i rgyal por gyur cig ce na/ de'i smon pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
322b5(mdo sde): kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce na/ de'i smon pa de grub par 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 
322b6(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce na/ de'i smon pa de grub par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod de ma la kye ma bdag
322b7(mdo sde): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par gyur cig ce na/ de'i smon pa de grub par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od
322b8(mdo sde): dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin meng dang / bsod nams 'phel ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mo gdung ba dang / gya nom
323a1(mdo sde): snang dang / legs par mthong dang / 'og min lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ce na/ de'i smon pa de grub par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod te/ 
323a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' tha' yas skye mched kyi 'du shesu nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi 'du shes su nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / ci yang med pa'i
323a3(mdo sde): skye mched kyi 'du shes su nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi 'du shes su nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par
323a4(mdo sde): gyur cig ce na/ de'i smon pa de grub par 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod de rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngonaHbya'o zhe na/ de'i smon pa de grub par 'gyur ro// gal
323a5(mdo sde): 'dod de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / rang byang chub mngon tu zhe na/ de'i smon pa de grub
323a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// gal te te 'dod de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig ce na/ de'i smon pa de grub par 'gyur
323a7(mdo sde): te/ mang po de dag ni gnas sbyin pa'i phan yon no// skom sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ dbang po thams cad yongs su tshang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'phral ba
323a8(mdo sde): dag cing / 'dzum pa'i bzhin du 'gyur ba dang / yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems kyi rgyud mnyen par 'gyur ba dang / skom par mi 'gyur ba dang / 
323b1(mdo sde): skom na yang chu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / yi dwags su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / longs spyod che bar 'gyur ba dang / mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur
323b2(mdo sde): du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni skom sbyin pa'i phan yon no// rab tu 'byung ba'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ de bu dang chung ma dang / nor la
323b3(mdo sde): sred par mi 'gyur ba dang / de 'dod pa yongasasu 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgon par gnas pa la dga' ba rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas la gus par 'gyur ba dang / 
323b4(mdo sde): bdud kyi spyod yul rnam par spong ba dang / bde 'gro tho ba par byed pa'i chos rnams yongs su tshol ba dang / ngan 'gro thob par byed pa'i chos rnams rnam par
323b5(mdo sde): spong ba dang / lha dang mir smon par byed pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab tu 'byung ba/ rnyed pa dang / mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur
323b6(mdo sde): du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba ste bcu po de dag ni rab tu 'byung ba'i phan yon no// dgon pa la gnas pa'i phan yon no bcu te bcu gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzin rnam par spong ba
323b7(mdo sde): dang / rab tu dben pa la bsten pa dang / de'i sems bsam gtan la dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la smon pa dang / dga' ba dang / 
323b8(mdo sde): bde ba dang / yid bde ba lus la skyed pa dang / de la bar du gcod pa mi 'byung ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rgya cher shes par 'gyur ba dang / 
324a1(mdo sde): zhi gnas thob pa dang / lhag mthong bya ste/ bcu po de dag ni dgon pa la gnas pa'i phan yon no// bsod snyoms pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang
324a2(mdo sde): ne na/ de 'gro ba la goms par 'gyur ba dang / de spyod yul goms par 'gyur ba dang / deng rgyal bcom par 'gyur ba dang / bdag rnyed pa la sbyor ba dang
324a3(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang bsod nams la rab tu 'god pa dang / ston pa'i bstan pa yongs su ston pa dang / phyi ma'i skye ba la snang bar byas par 'gyur ba dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par
324a4(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams la 'am nga ba med par byas par 'gyur ba dang // dma' ba'i sems nye bar gzhag par/ 'gyur ba dang / bsod snyoms kyis yongasu dul ba'i
324a5(mdo sde): dge slong phyogs la mun pa med par snang ba'o// 'jigs pa med pa'i phan yon bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med par grong du 'jug pa dang / 'jigs pa med
324a6(mdo sde): par grong nas 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa med par khyim rnamasu 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa med par 'khor la chos ston pa dang / 'jigs pa med par dge 'dun gyi nang du
324a7(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / 'jigs pa med par slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa med par byas pa'i sems kyis slob ma'i gan du 'gro ba dang
324a8(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med par gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams yongs su sbyor ba dang / 'jigs pa med par kha ton 'don pa dang // 
324b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// bram ze'i khye'u de ltar na/ sems can rnams ni las bdag gir 'gyur ba/ las kyi skye gnas can las kyi bgo skal
324b2(mdo sde): la spyod pa/ las la rngon pa ste/ sems can rnams ni las kyis btsun pa dang / dma' ba dang / dman pa dang / bzang por rnam par phye'o// zheng ngas gang smras pa de ni/ 
324b3(mdo sde): las 'di las bsams te smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ to'u te ya'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso// bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dang ngo // de
324b4(mdo sde): nas to'u te ya'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// go'u ta ma khyod mnyan du yod par dge snyen gyi khyim dag tu gshegs par dgongs
324b5(mdo sde): blta na/ de ltar to'u te ya'i khyim du yang gshegs pa dgongs su gsol// des ni to'u te ya'i khyim du yin ring ba'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// 
324b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsungs pas to'u te ya'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tse la gnang ba mdzad do// // de nas to'u te ya'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne ces/ bcom
324b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang
324b8(mdo sde): bas song ngo // las rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dran shI la dang / mu ni bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo rgya ba na / 
325a1(mdo sde): ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la bab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ ar+yA su ba daHpra b+ha sad tam su dzan dra
325a2(mdo sde): nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po/ 
325a3(mdo sde): 'dres pa me byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// bdag gis
325a4(mdo sde): thos pa dus cig na bya rgod phung po chos kyi dbyings// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul na// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas ni// dag cing rdul rnams med pa yi// byang
325a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mchog rnams la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po ste/ mdor na shin tu zab pa dang / yo ngasu brtags na zab pa nyid// gser 'od dam pa'i 'chad/ 
325a6(mdo sde): phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// byin gyis rlabs gyis byin brlabs pa// mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogasu// rin chen tog gis lho phyogasu// 'od dpag med kyis
325a7(mdo sde): nub phyogs su// rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogs su// sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir// bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa// sdig pa'i las rnams zad byed pa// bde ba thams
325a8(mdo sde): cad sbyin byed pa// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi// dpal kun gyis ni legs brgyan pa// byin gyis brlabs de brjod par bya// 
325b1(mdo sde): sems can gang dag dbang po nyams// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang // phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang // lha rnams rgyab kyi phyogs pa dang // mdza' sdug skye bo sdang
325b2(mdo sde): pa dang // bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang // phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin dang // nor 'gribs pa dang gnod pa dang // mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang // 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang // 
325b3(mdo sde): gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang // mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang // mya ngan ngal las byung ba yis// rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang // des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma
325b4(mdo sde): yisatemado sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing // gos gtsang rnams kyis rab brgya na te// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul pa// mdo 'di nyan par
325b5(mdo sde): byed na ni// mdo sde 'di'i gzi brjid kyis// srog chags kun gyi gnod pa dag/ shin tu mi zad 'di dang 'dra// de dag6tu zhi bar gyur// 'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang // 
325b6(mdo sde): blon po tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis// de dag la ni srung bar byed// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // na ra 'dza' nar gnas pa dang // 'byung po ma mo
325b7(mdo sde): 'phrog ma dang / sa'i lha mo bcan ma dang // tshangs pa'i dbang dang lnga dbang dang // klu dbang mthu chen rnams dang ni// mi 'am ci dbang lnga min dbang // de bzhin namakha'i lding dbang rnams
325b8(mdo sde): dang / rje dang tha~Mngs dang gnan pa dang // bcas cang dag dang lpags sa chen pa mitshan ma ma gsol bar // de dgal ma spang bar byed// rnams sarjes ng+ge
326a1(mdo sde): // yul pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gas pa ste// bskal pa bye ba na dka' ba// mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang // gang ngag gan
326a2(mdo sde): 'dzes byed dang // gang dag rjes su yi rang dang // gang dag mchod par byed pa rnams// de dag lha dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang // lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis/ 
326a3(mdo sde): bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur// srog chags bsod nams byed pa rnams// de dag bsod nams phung po ni// mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang // bsam gyis mi
326a4(mdo sde): khyab skye bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // rab tu gzung bar 'gyur ba yin/ 
326a5(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la// dri zhim pa'i gos 'chang zhing // byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas// g.yel ba med par mchod par bya// rang gi
326a6(mdo sde): sems ni dri med cing // rgya che bar yang rab byed la// sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par gyis// gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni// de dag mi nang legs
326a7(mdo sde): par 'ongs// ma'i srid pa legs par thob// 'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur// gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang // bshad pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba// de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa
326a8(mdo sde): ste// sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po las// gleng bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// 
326b1(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ dge
326b2(mdo sde): rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
326b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ 'di ltar sku tshe zung snyam nas/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe
326b4(mdo sde): ring bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang / kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o// / zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ni
326b5(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po/ srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar du yang dag par blangs te gnas par gyur
326b6(mdo sde): zas kyang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang ste/ tha na rang gi lus kyi sha dang / khrag dang rus pa dang rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par
326b7(mdo sde): mdzad na/ zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo// de nas skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las/ 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis bsam pa 'di dag
326b8(mdo sde): sems pa na de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che la bai DUr+ya sngon po las grub pa/ lha'i rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo // 
327a1(mdo sde): lha'i las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to// khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te/ khri de dag las kyang / lha'i
327a2(mdo sde): khri lha'i ras bcos bu rin po che'i phrugs rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur to// khri de dag las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin po che du mas spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs
327a3(mdo sde): pas kha dog bsgyur ba dgra byung ngo // pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur te/ shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa
327a4(mdo sde): byung / lho phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung / nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshe dgas pa che dpag med byung / byang phyogs nas ni de
327a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/ seng ge'i khri de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
327a6(mdo sde): chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang / phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
327a7(mdo sde): kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/ lha'i me tog dag gi char yang bab lha'i sril snyan gyi sgra yang byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
327a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang / lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can dbang po ma tshang pa rnams ni dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/ 
327b1(mdo sde): sems can dmus long dag ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa dag ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/ sems can smyon pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/ sems can
327b2(mdo sde): g.yeng ba dag ni sems mi g.yeng bar gyur// sems can sgren mo rnams ni gos bgo bar gyur// sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'grangs par gyur// sems can skom pa
327b3(mdo sde): ngag dang bral bar gyur// sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur// lus kyi dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du ngo
327b4(mdo sde): mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ ngo mtshar
327b5(mdo sde): rmad du gyur to// de tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes na sa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang na ba de logs
327b6(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btad nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams la rjesu dran la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rje su dran zhing bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i
327b7(mdo sde): sku tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/ sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing / 
327b8(mdo sde): 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
328a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku che thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig/ da ci'i phyir nan/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin
328a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par lce dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas
328a3(mdo sde): pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / wa dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i
328a4(mdo sde): sku tshe'i tshad kyi phyi ma'i mtha' mu'i bar du yang rtogs par nus pa nged kyis su yang ma mthong ngo // sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs
328a5(mdo sde): po'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu 'dod pa ni spyod pa rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang / 
328a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du
328a7(mdo sde): ma 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhag so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la/ bcom ldan
328a8(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa tshigasu bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa// rgya mtsho'i chu rnams thams cad kyi// thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus// shAkya
328b1(mdo sde): thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang // phra rab rdul du bgrang bar nus// shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang
328b2(mdo sde): grang bar mi nuso// sa la gang dag yod pa yi// rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa// thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi// rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus// gal te la las nam
328b3(mdo sde): mkha' la// sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang // shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad// sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs// bskal
328b4(mdo sde): pa dag ni 'di snyed cig/ bskal pa bye ba brgya dag ces/ grangs ni rnyed par mi rung // gang phyir de'i rgyu gnyis ni// rgyu dang rkyen kyang rnam gnyis te// sdig pa'i 'tshe ba spang
328b5(mdo sde): pa dang // kha zas mang po byin pa ste/ de phyir bdag nyid chen po yi// sku tshe'i grangs ni mi rnyed de// bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce'am// grangs med pa yang de bzhin te// 
328b6(mdo sde): bas the tshom med par 'gyur// the tshom cung zad ma za cig/ rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tha ma yi// grangs ni gang du yang mi dmig so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor deng slob dpon lung sten
328b7(mdo sde): pa bram ze ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba dang / bram ze stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos
328b8(mdo sde): nas/ 'phral la dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das sems
329a1(mdo sde): // can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/ zugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/ zla ba lta bu snang bar mdzad pa
329a2(mdo sde): shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing // gal te khyed sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na// bdag la dam pa cig sul du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
329a3(mdo sde): cad mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyis mthus 'khor der ling ci byi gzho nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/ slob dpon lung snyan pa bram ze
329a4(mdo sde): ko'u de n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so// ci bram ze chen po khyod pa com ldan 'das la dam pa cig gsol lam/ bdug gis khyod la dam po cig sbyino// bram zes smras pa/ lid tsa byi bzhon nu// bdag
329a5(mdo sde): gis ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / ring srel gyi phye ma dgos pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsra la yungs 'bru tsam la bsten par 'dod // ring bsrel yungs 'bru
329a6(mdo sde): de mngon mchod na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po 'ba' shig 'thob ces grag/ kye lI tsa byi gzhonu/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
329a7(mdo sde): shes par dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dag dang ldan pa/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'chad ces grag gis nyon cig/ kye lid tsa byi gzho nu// gser 'od dam pa'i ma
329a8(mdo sde): ni de ltar shes par dka' zhing / rtogs par dka' bas na// kha ze cag mtha' 'khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni// gang bcangs na sems can nams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ga
329b1(mdo sde): po 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam/ za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcad kyang rung // kye lid tsa byi gzho nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yung 'bru tsam gsol
329b2(mdo sde): nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog tu bcug ste/ bcangs pas sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par mi 'dong ngam/ kye ling tsa byi gzho du kho zas ni dam pa de lta bu gsal
329b3(mdo sde): de nas lid tsa bye gco nu// 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas slob dpon lung ston pa/ bram ze ko'u di n+ya la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar smras pa/ nam zhig gang ga'i chu rgyun
329b4(mdo sde): laT me tog rnams ni skyes pa dang / bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang / khu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang // 'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags dang // 'bra gor a mra'i dog pa chags// 
329b5(mdo sde): tshe na yungs 'bru tsam// ring bsel du ni gsal bar 'gyur// / nam zhig ru sbal spu rnams las// gosu legs par btags gyur te/ dgun gyi grang ba sel byed pa// de tshe ring bsra
329b6(mdo sde): yod par 'gyur// nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las// yang dog legs par byas gyur te// brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig srin bu pad+ma kun// so
329b7(mdo sde): dkar por skyes gyur te// rno zhing chen por gyur pa na// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// mtho ri su ni bzag pa'i phyir// nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las// skas ni legs par byas gyur pa// 
329b8(mdo sde): ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig skas ni der 'dzags te// byi bas zla ba bza' ba dang // sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// grong na rgyu ba'i sbrang ba
330a1(mdo sde): / yis canam zhig rdza ma'i 'chang 'thungs te// khyim na gnas par byed 'gyur ba// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig bong bu bde gyur la// mchu slar bim pa 'dra
330a2(mdo sde): 'gyur cing daglu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nom zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams// dben par dong nas rtse ba dang // phan tshun 'thun par 'gyur ba ni// de tshe ring bsrel
330a3(mdo sde): yong par 'gyur// pa la sha'i lo ma rnams// rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te// char 'bab skyabasu nam gyur pa// de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur// nam zhig rgya mtsho gru bo che// 'khrul 'khor
330a4(mdo sde): dang ni g.yor mor bcas// thang la byung ste 'gro ba na// de tshe ring bsrel yong par 'gyur// nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa yis/ ri bo spos kyi ngang ldang ba// mchu la thogs te 'gro 'gyur ba// de
330a5(mdo sde): bsrel yod par 'gyur// slob dpon lung ston pa// bram ze ko/ 'u di n+yas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas ling rtsa bya gzho nu 'jig rten thaMd kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigasu bcad pa
330a6(mdo sde): 'di dag gis slar smras pa/ leg so legaso gzho nu mchog/ rgyal ba'i sras po tshigs po che// dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa// lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa'o/ 
330a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid// bsams kyi mi khyab go rims bzhin// gno nus bdag la mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas yul ni bsams mi khyab// de bzhin gshegs rnams ma tshungs
330a8(mdo sde): med sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu ni// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag byung // sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid min// bcom ldan 'das
330b1(mdo sde): bcos ma min// de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te// rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku// sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad// drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni// yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med// sku la rus pa khrag
330b2(mdo sde): med na// ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
330b3(mdo sde): dbyings// chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 'dra// bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni// bdag gis dam pa gsol ba byas// de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir// gtam gleng
330b4(mdo sde): ni bdag gis byas// de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis steng gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de lta bu de dag thos nas/ thad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
330b5(mdo sde): du sems bskyed// de dag yid kyi kun tu rtog par rab tu dag 'a nas/ sgra dbyangs gcig tu tshigasu bcad pa 'dir ga spros// sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi
330b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ sems can yongasu smin mdzad phyir// yongasu mung na 'da' ba ston// sangs rgyas bcom ldan pasam mi khya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku// sems can rnams la phan
330b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir// bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las// bcom ldan 'das shA
330b8(mdo sde): thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos na// tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes na/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gsheg
330b9(mdo sde): pa sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i cha/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang
331a1(mdo sde): // bar gyur to gser 'ad ngas pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i chang bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ gnyis pa'o// de nas byang chu sems dpa'
331a2(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i tog gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ gser gyi rnga kun tu snang ba 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong // phyogs thad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu
331a3(mdo sde): med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing 'khor brgya stong du mas yong su bskur te/ mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong // de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i bachu
331a4(mdo sde): lta bu zhig rje de rdung ba mthong ste/ rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ba thos// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sad ma thag tu bstan pa'i tshi gsu bcad pa de
331a5(mdo sde): dag rje su dra no// rje su dran nas kyang / de'i mtshan mo sad pa dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig
331a6(mdo sde): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
331a7(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i rtog gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ rmi lam na gang rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshigasu bcad pa
331a8(mdo sde): thos pa de dag gsol to// gser 'ang dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rmi lam mthong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o// // nub gcig g.ye ba med par yang // bdag gi rmil
331b1(mdo sde): gyur pa ni mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste/ thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od// ji ltar nyi ma bzhin du 'bar// kun tu rnam par lnga de ste/ phyogs bcu dag du snang bar gyur// kun tu rin chen shing drung
331b2(mdo sde): rin chen bai DUr+ya dag gi/ khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs ste// brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi// 'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong // bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig/ rnga chen rab tu rdung bar
331b3(mdo sde): mthong nga ngo yis de la brdungs pa dang // tshig su bcad pa 'di dag byung // gser 'od dam pa rnga chen sgra yis ni// stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'dir// ngan song sdug bsngal man
331b4(mdo sde): rje'i sdug bsngal dang // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal zhi bar shog/ rnga bo che'i rnga skad 'di yis ni// 'jig rten rmongs pa tha zhi gyur cig/ ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jig
331b5(mdo sde): zhi ltarasems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar ga/ ga/ ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po// 'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar// skye dgu'i ting 'dzin
331b6(mdo sde): chub yan la gi/ yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur// rnga bo che yi rnga skad 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan shog/ sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa mchog reg
331b7(mdo sde): shog chos kyi 'khor lo dge bskor gyur cig/ bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog/ 'gro la bar phyir chos kyang sngon gyur cig/ nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel
331b8(mdo sde): shog 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig/ sems can gang dag lus ngan sar gnas te// rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba// de dag rje chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig/ 
332a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig thos shog/ sems can kun gyis skye ba brgya dag dang // skye ba stong phrag bye ba skye dran shog/ thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig/ 
332a2(mdo sde): dag gi ni rgya chen gsungs thos shig/ rnga bo che yi rnga skad 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed 'gyur// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog khya ba dge bar blan
332a3(mdo sde): spyod gyur cig/ mi dang lha dang srog chags thad kyi// de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa// rnga bo che yi rnga skad 'di yis ni// de dag rnams kyis de kun rdzogs gyur cig/ sems can gang dag
332a4(mdo sde): sems dmyal mi bzang skye// lus la me lce kun tu rab 'bar ba// skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa// me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog/ sems dmyal yi dgas mi ma
332a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten na// sems can mi bzang sdug bsngal drag po gang // rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni// de dag na mas kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog / rten med dpung gnyen med pa da
332a6(mdo sde): skyabs med par mi gyur pa dag/ de dag rnams ni sgrub pa dang // dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag/ thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs// 
332a7(mdo sde): dog phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ni// bzhugs pa bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa'i las// shin tu mi bzang gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag
332a8(mdo sde): te de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// pha ma dag du mi 'dzin dang // sangs rgyas rnam su mi 'dzin dang // dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas// sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis dang // drug
332b1(mdo sde): rgyags pas dregs pa dang // rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang // gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/ bdag gis sdig pa gang gyis dang // nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang // nyes pa
332b2(mdo sde): bgyis pa'i las rnams dang // nyes pa'i dmigasum bltas dang // bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // byis pa'i blo yis 'jug pa dang // mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni// sdig pa'i grogs
332b3(mdo sde): po'i dbang gyur dang // nyon mongs rnam par 'khrugs sems dang // rtse mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang // mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang // nor gyis mi chog nyen pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gung
332b4(mdo sde): bgyis dang // 'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang // pha dog se ra sA'i sgyu dang ni// g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // 'phongs pa 'byung ba dus kyi
332b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams kyis 'jigs rgyu dang // phyug po ma yin gyu ra pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang // 'dod dang khro ba'i ngang dag
332b6(mdo sde): bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang // bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir// nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis// 
332b7(mdo sde): bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang // lus dang ngage dang yid kyi sdig/ nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum bsags// 'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa// de dag zang bdag 'chags sangs rgyas
332b8(mdo sde): rnams dang chos rnams dang // de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chu
333a1(mdo sde): // sems dpa' rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// dam chos smra ba rnams la yang // gus pa ma lags gang bgyis dang // chos la
333a2(mdo sde): 'ang gus par ma bgyis pa// de dag thaMd bdag 'chag so// bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas// dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang // pha ma rnams la ma gus gang // de dag tha~Md bdag 'chag so// blun pa dang / 
333a3(mdo sde): byis pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa// de dag thang bdag 'chag so// bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// stobs bcu rnams la mchod par
333a4(mdo sde): shog/ bdag ni phyogs bcur sems can rnams// sdug bsngal kun las 'don gyur cig sems can bsams kyis mi khyab kun// sa bcu dag la 'god par shogs bcu dag la gnas na kyang
333a5(mdo sde): thaMd de bzhin gshegs gyur cig/ ji srid sdug bsngal rgya ma tshe las// de kun thar bgyid nus srid// sems can re re'i phyir yang ni// bskal pa bye bar spyod par shog/ gser 'od dam
333a6(mdo sde): pa zhes bgyis pa// las rnams thams cad byang byed pa// zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di// sems can de dag ston gyur cig/ gang gis bskal pa stong rnamasu// sdig pa shin tu mi bzang bgyis// 
333a7(mdo sde): lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis// de dag thaMd byang bar 'gyur// gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams// myur du yang dag zad gyur pa// gser 'od dam pa dge ba yi// bshags pa 'di dag bshags
333a8(mdo sde): nas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po// sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi// srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang
333b1(mdo sde): yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de// sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis// thams cad mkhyen du rdzogs par bgyi// ting 'dzin brgya phrag steng rnams dang // gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi
333b2(mdo sde): khyab dang dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gis// stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi// dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams// bdag la rnam par gzigasu gsol// thugs rje ldan
333b3(mdo sde): pa'i thags kyis ni// nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol// bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams// sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa// de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems// phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas
333b4(mdo sde): gzir nga sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid// yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur// gang dang gang du spyod bgyid pa// dag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis// sangs rgyas thang thugs rje ldan
333b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel ba// nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol// 'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdze da// bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi// dri ma de bzhin gshegs
333b6(mdo sde): bas shol// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni// snying rje chu yis bkru bar gsol// sdig pa thaMd bshags par bgyi// sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang // da ltar bdagi sdig pa gang / de
333b7(mdo sde): dag thod bdag 'chag so// nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun// sran chad mi bgyid bsdam par bgyi// bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang // sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o// lus
333b8(mdo sde): kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams// de dag thams cad bdag 'chag so// lus kyis 'gyis dang ngag gis las/ yid kyis
334a1(mdo sde): // rnam par bsams pa dang // las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag/ de dag thams cad bdag 'chagaso// mi dge'i las bcu spangs na su// dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis te// sa bcu la ni bdag
334a2(mdo sde): gnas bgyis stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi// bdag gis sdig pa'i las gang dag/ mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa// sangs rgyas spyan ngar mchis nas ni// de dag thad bshags par bgyi
334a3(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang // 'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag du// gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa// de dag kun la yid rang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // bdag gis bsod
334a4(mdo sde): nams gang bsgrubs pa// bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des// byang chu ba mchog la reg par bgyi// srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni// shin tu mi bzang sdig pa gang bgyis pa// stobs bcu ma
334a5(mdo sde): mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so sor bya sha/ gas par bgyi// skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang // jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar// lus kyi spyod pa nyam pa
334a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis// bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chag so// byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang // sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang // srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang // 
334a7(mdo sde): sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang // dal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang // bsod nams bsgrubs pa'i nyam nga dag gis kyang // rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni// sdig pa de kun so
334a8(mdo sde): bshags par bgyis// sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri rab 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho 'dri la phyag 'tsha'o// rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabasu mchi// rgyal ba de dag rnams la mgos phyag 'tsha
334b1(mdo sde): gsor mdog gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi 'od// dri med rnam dgra bai DUr+ya'i yan lag spyan// sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas// thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun
334b2(mdo sde): ba mun nag bsal// yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab/ nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la// thub pa
334b3(mdo sde): zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzad// dbye byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes// dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar
334b4(mdo sde): 'khrugs 'od zer 'dra ba yis// 'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs// dri med rgya chen khaM dag sna tshogs bai DUr+ya// skya reng dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar
334b5(mdo sde): 'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pa// thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis mdzes// mya ngan 'bru ga pa'i 'chi chu dga' ba'i dbul rlabs can// 'khor ba'i klung chen
334b6(mdo sde): phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsu ba cing shugs drag pa// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyis skems// yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang
334b7(mdo sde): ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog/ rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnams spras pa// sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tsha'o// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med
334b8(mdo sde): ji ltar sa las rdul mtha' yas dang // ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang // ji ltar na mkha'i khams ni mtha' yas pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te// sems can
335a1(mdo sde): / kun gyis shes par mi nuso// bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni// yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nu so// chu ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang // rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor ba ni
335a2(mdo sde): bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan pa mtha' shes mi nus// yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang // dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang / dpe byang ba
335a3(mdo sde): po brgyad bcus brgyan pa yis// sems can thaMd de 'drar gyur par shog/ bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir chos kyang
335a4(mdo sde): bstan par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar par bgyi// stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal bar bgyi// chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar bgyi// bskal pa bsam gyis
335a5(mdo sde): mi khyab gnas par bgyi// bdud rtsi'i chu yis sems can tshim par bgyi// ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba'i rdzogs ba ltar// pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par 'gyi// nyon mongs
335a6(mdo sde): gzhom zhing sdug bsngal bsal bar bgyi// 'dod chags ga'i mug zhe sdang zhi bar bgyi// skye ba brgya dang skye ba bye ba stong // bdag ni rtag tu skye ba dran par bgyi// thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu/ 
335a7(mdo sde): par bgyi de'i gsung ni rgya chen mos par bgyi// bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par bgyi// sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spangs par bgyi// 
335a8(mdo sde): ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyad par bgyi// zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang // 'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhir gyur// sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams
335b1(mdo sde): de kun de'u dbang po tshang bar shog/ gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang // phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams// de kun myur du nang las thar gyur cig/ nad med stobs dang dang
335b2(mdo sde): po rnyed par shog/ gang dag rgyal po chom rkun spre'u bsdigs gsad thug dang // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur pa// sems can nyams thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag
335b3(mdo sde): 'jigs mchog mi bzang brgya po de las thar gyur cig/ gang dag brdegs cing bcing bas bcings zir pa// phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing // nyon mongs stong phrag du mas bkrug
335b4(mdo sde): nas kyang // 'jigs pa mi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed// de ngag zad bcings las grol gyur cig/ brdeg pa dag ni brde ga las thar gyur cig/ gsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig
335b5(mdo sde): phongs gyur zang 'jigs pa med par shog/ sems can tha mas cad bkres sred skom gyis gzir// de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog/ long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs
335b6(mdo sde): mthong gyur cig/ 'ong bas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog/ gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur// sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog/ nor bu 'bru rin chen sna
335b7(mdo sde): tshogs mang po yis// sems can thong bde ba dang ldan par shog gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur// sems can thang bldan sdug pa dang // gzugs bza' mdzes shing tshul dus
335b8(mdo sde): par shog/ rtag tu bde ba du ma rdzogs gyur cig/ yid kyi zas skom rab 'phyir bsod nams dag/ bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig/ rdza rnga cang te'u pi wang sgra snyan dang / mu mig ma
336a1(mdo sde): rdzing bu lteng ka dang gser gyi pad+ma ud dpal pad+ma can// zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUr+ya// de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur
336a2(mdo sde): cig 'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung // sems can gcig kyang mi 'bong mthong ma gyur// de dag thang kha dog rgya chen dang // phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog ma'i 'jig rten duH
336a3(mdo sde): sum tshogs gang yod// de dang bsams par skye ba de dag gyur// bsam pa tha~Mng bsams ma thag tu yang // bsod nams 'bras bus yongasu rdzogs par shog/ spos dang 'phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang
336a4(mdo sde): gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog/ sems can de dag len cig dgar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thang dang // rdzogs
336a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nyan thos dang // rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang // phyogs bcu rnamasu mchod pa byed par shog/ 'gro ba dma' ba thaMng spong gyur cig/ mi khom
336a6(mdo sde): brgyad po dag las 'das par shog/ dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog/ rtag tu mthon pa'i rigasu skye bar shog/ nor dang 'bru'i mdzod na
336a7(mdo sde): 'byor gyur cig/ snyan dang grangs dang gzugs dang kha dog gis// bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog/ bud med thang rtag tu phor gyur te// dpa' shing rtul pong mkhas shing gsal
336a8(mdo sde): shog de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur// pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog/ phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung // sangs rgyas de bzhugs rin chen bai DUr+ya'i// khri la su
336b1(mdo sde): pa dag ni mthong gyur cig/ chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni// srid panyam ngar sngon chang gang bsgrubs pa// sdig las gang dag mi 'dod
336b2(mdo sde): 'bras thob pa// de dag thang ma lus zad gyur cig/ sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun// 'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa// shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol
336b3(mdo sde): bar shog/ sdug bsngal rnams thar bar myur gyur cig/ sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang // gang dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na// bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed
336b4(mdo sde): pa de dag kun la rje su yi rang // lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yi// bdag gis rje su yi rang bsod nams de// bdag gis smon grub 'bras bu yod par shog/ byang chub rdul bral ba
336b5(mdo sde): med thob gyur cig/ gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang // dri mad yid kyis phyag 'tsha la bstod pa dang // yongasu ba sngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni// bskal pa drug cur ngan song spong bar
336b6(mdo sde): gyur tshig su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis// skyes pa bu med bram ze rgyal rigs las// thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang stong pa// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur// yan lag dbang po
336b7(mdo sde): kun gyis yan lag brgyan// bsod nams yon ton sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu mchod// de dang de dag ku ni de 'drar 'gyur// gang dag rma bla gar bshags pa
336b8(mdo sde): 'di ni grag gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas me yin// gnyis la ma yin bani lam yin lnga min bcu la min// de ltar sangs rgyas stong gi gnas nas
337a1(mdo sde): // ba byas ma yin// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// bshags pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o// / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
337a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyis lha mo
337a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na// rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba des de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd la bstod pa/ pad+ma'i 'thung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
337a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod// rgyal ba gang dag sngar thung gyur pa dang // phyogs pa cu'i 'jig rten dag na gang gzhes pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams la
337a5(mdo sde): phyag bgyi'o// rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod// thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag/ sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu ganga'// dbyangs rnams kun gyis sangs rgyas gsung snyan
337a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags par gsungs// bung ba rma bya ud dpal sngon po'i dbu// mthon ting lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra/ kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems// rtag tu gser ltar
337a7(mdo sde): rnam par mdzes par dga'// spyan ni ring zhing mthon ting dri ma med// ul dpal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra// ljags ni che zhing legs la pad+ma'i mdog/ pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra// 
337a8(mdo sde): gyi mdzod spu bang rtsa dung 'dra yang // be 'u rgya'i mdog 'dra gas su 'khyil/ thub pa'i zla ba phra zhing zla ba zad pa 'dra// sku'i lte 'bung ba gsal ba bzhin// zhal mtho ba'i shangs ni rtag tu rtsen
337b1(mdo sde): ste 'jam zhes la'i gser ltar kha dog bzang // rtag par rgyun tu rgyal ba thams cad kyi// ro mchog 'jam shing dam pa'i cho ga rab 'phags// spu'i bu ga nas ni re re skyes/ spu rnams skyes
337b2(mdo sde): pa g.yasu 'khyil ba ste// mthon ting 'od 'bar 'tsher zhing lcang la can// rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes// bltam ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
337b3(mdo sde): ngag ni thad gang // 'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi// bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim// sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dag/ yi dgas lha gnas mi'i
337b4(mdo sde): 'gro rnams// sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim// ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thang zhi/ kha dog mdog bzang ba/ ser dang 'dra ba'i 'od // bco ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku
337b5(mdo sde): bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal// 'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal// gzho nub ces 'dra sku lus yan lag 'jam/ seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis non po'i
337b6(mdo sde): mchog phyag ring phyag ni rab tu ring ba ste/ sa la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// 'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu stong // nyi ma stong pas rab tu lhag gi'o// thub pa'i dbang ba
337b7(mdo sde): sku mchog dri ma med// zhing rnams mtha' yas thaMd rab tu snang // sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lha nga bas// zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnamasu yang // mtshan byed zla ba nyi ma mang po nga
337b8(mdo sde): de dag thams cad 'od ni med par gyur// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste// sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni// zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag brgya dag na/ de bzhi
338a1(mdo sde): // gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong / bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku// yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku// glang chen dbang po'i sde 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag drug pa
338a2(mdo sde): zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma med// sa'i steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra rnyed// phra ba'i rdul rnyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed byung ba dang // gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhug
338a3(mdo sde): yi nga rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i// ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul ba dang // spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dang ni// dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal// rgyal ba
338a4(mdo sde): yon tan gang dag dger gyur pa// snying po mchog rab sna tsho gas du ma ste// bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis// sangs rgyas yon tan brjod par mi nuso// rgyal ba gcig yon ta/ 
338a5(mdo sde): rnams kyang ni// lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus// bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni zad kyi// yon tan ga/ cig rgyas brjod pa ga la nus// lhur bcas 'jig rten thang
338a6(mdo sde): gyur te// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba// skra'i rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyi// bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min// lus dang ngag yid rab tu dang ba yis// rgyal
338a7(mdo sde): kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas// bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog bsags gang // des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig/ de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams snyad
338a8(mdo sde): nas nga rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnamasu yang // gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na// rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga lta zhing // der ni bshas
338b1(mdo sde): pa 'di 'dra mnyam par bgyi// rgyal stong pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba// skye ba de dang der ni rnyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang // gang dag bskal pa stong du rnyed dka
338b2(mdo sde): ba de dag rmi lam du yang mnyan par bgyi// nyin gyur tshe yang de dag bshad par bgyi// sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar par bgyi// pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs par bgyi// phyin
338b3(mdo sde): byang chub bla med thob par bgyi// bdag gi zhing ni lhod pa med gyur cig/ rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang // rgyal ba tha~Md la bstod pa'i rgyus// shAkya thub dbang mngon du blta bar dgyi/ 
338b4(mdo sde): der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig/ gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od// bang gi khye'u ni gang yin la de gnyis kyang // der ni bu po de dag gnyis gdang // byang chub bla med lung
338b5(mdo sde): bstan thob par shog/ sems can gang dag gnas med rten med cing // skyabs dang bral nas 'phongs par gyur pa dag/ de dag la'ang ma 'ongs dus rnams na// skyob dang dpung nyen sa
338b6(mdo sde): dang rten gyur shog/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig/ bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog/ sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa// ma 'ongs bskal pa byang chub spyad par
338b7(mdo sde): bgyi gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshegs pa yi// bdag sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skams par shog/ bdag las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig/ bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho zad par shog/ bdag gi da
338b8(mdo sde): nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig/ ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis// bad gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog/ yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor gyur par shog byang chub yon te yon tan ra/ 
339a1(mdo sde): / chen rdzogs chagaser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni// bang gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog/ bang gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag gyur// ye shes dri med snang bdas pa 'i
339a2(mdo sde): zang gi lus kyis 'od ni snang bar shog/ bsod nams snang ba lha ger bya ba'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig/ bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog/ sdug bsngal
339a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang // bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis// ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad par bgyi// 'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs// de dag zhing ni rgyal ba tha
339a4(mdo sde): yon tan mtha' yas khyad 'phags ci 'dra ba// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag zhing // ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyurar bar shog/ gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// 2
339a5(mdo sde): bdung ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa zad la bstad pa/ me tog pad+ma'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
339a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gsung so// bsams kyis mi khyab mdo rnams gzhan dag tu// stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa
339a7(mdo sde): chos rnams mdo tsam bshad pa yin// sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas// chos rnams thang shes par mi nus ste// de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir// stong pa'i chos rnams mad
339a8(mdo sde): tsam bshad pa yin// sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang // sems can 'byung ba'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang // thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni// mdo mchog
339b1(mdo sde): dam pa dbang po 'di bshad// lus 'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te/ dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra// de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam
339b2(mdo sde): mi she so mig dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna'i dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce'i dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyu ga/ lus kyi dbang
339b3(mdo sde): reg pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// rang rang yul du rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma bzhin du g.yo ba yin
339b4(mdo sde): dbang po drug ni yul la rnam par spyod// ji ltar mi zhig gro nga stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing / 
339b5(mdo sde): dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab tu shes// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te// dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab shes te// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams
339b6(mdo sde): ro dang reg byang bzhin spyod yul ches// sems ni dbang po drug po thad la// dbang por zhugs pa bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes
339b7(mdo sde): par bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yong su rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor / 
339b8(mdo sde): ba gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan gnas phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sprul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun 'brum
340a1(mdo sde): // ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu gnyis gnyis te
340a2(mdo sde): khams sbrul de dag thaMng 'jig par 'gyur// sa'i sbrul dang chu'i sbrul dgra dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me'i sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis
340a3(mdo sde): steng gi na mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji lta sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dang // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar byas pa'i
340a4(mdo sde): las kyis srid par skyed// bad ka ni rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na// lus shing gcin dang ngan sngags rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur// dur khrod dag ni mthong / 
340a5(mdo sde): shing bzhin gyur lho mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can de bzhin gang zag dang // chos rnams 'di dag thang stong pa ste// ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin/ 
340a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'thung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung te// gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod// ma rig pa ni gzhar yang yod mis
340a7(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig pa 'di yod pa ma yin te/ de bsangs ni ma rig 'di ba sha do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang
340a8(mdo sde): tshor ba dang // sred dang lon dang de bzhin srid pa dang // skye dang rga/ shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar ga
340b1(mdo sde): pa dag ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'thung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang // bdag gis lta bar gyur pa gcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo drol
340b2(mdo sde): phung po gnas la stong par gyur pa ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// nga ni bdud rtsi'i
340b3(mdo sde): grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ nga ni bdud ci'i khu bas bdag tshim bya// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'ar
340b4(mdo sde): byas 'angs ni chos kyi char pa dam pa pab// da ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral
340b5(mdo sde): ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs me yi sa gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog chags nyon mongs sems gdungs
340b6(mdo sde): zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bar tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal pa du ma sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongasu tshol ba na// rtul zhugs
340b7(mdo sde): brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyigs nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bai DUr+ya dang rin chen sna tshog pa ta
340b8(mdo sde): stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // rtsa dang rtsa rnams thang dang // nags rtsal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad gcang gtubs te// de dag thaMd phyir blags nas// rab tu bra
341a1(mdo sde): / rdul 'drar byas can mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par// phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// stong gsum dag ni thad kyi// rdul
341a2(mdo sde): khams bsams kyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // da ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi// phye ma bgrang byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa
341a3(mdo sde): ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thad bgrang bar nus srid kyis// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nus// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang du
341a4(mdo sde): 'ang bgrang bar mi nu so// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang // rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung
341a5(mdo sde): dang rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bza nga stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gtso ga la bgos nas// pus mo g.yA yi lhang nga sa la btsugs te
341a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni// de bzhin
341a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa thaMd kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tha~Md kyis yongasu bzung ba// lha'i tshogs tha
341a8(mdo sde): kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thaMd kyis mngon par bstod ga 'jig rten skyong ba zad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab tu
341b1(mdo sde): bar lha'i khang khyims thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje 'jig
341b2(mdo sde): rten gyi sdug bsngal thang skems pa/ 'jigs pa thad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmags tshogs thang rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thang rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa thad zhi
341b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ gza' ba thaMd sel ba/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs pa tha~Md rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags
341b4(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yang dag par bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po
341b5(mdo sde): chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog dang bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'di gzi rdzid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// / bdag cag gis lus la brtson pa dang stobs dang mthu yang
341b6(mdo sde): bskyed par 'gyur// gzi brji dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang // bdag gis lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa
341b7(mdo sde): chos smrab chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang nakha' lding dang / dri za dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen
341b8(mdo sde): po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal
342a1(mdo sde): // bzhi gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu/ rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam par dag ga mi'i las 'das pas 'a
342a2(mdo sde): bu'i gling zad la blta bar 'gyi// bsrung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i sladang bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chags// btsun pa
342a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmagos tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ga'i dgon pa 'am/ nad kyi dgon pa 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa sta
342a4(mdo sde): dang gnod pa brgya phrag stong gis brtses par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong
342a5(mdo sde): smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag ga rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul ban
342a6(mdo sde): yul gang dang gang du mchi bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag du rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong
342a7(mdo sde): yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i
342a8(mdo sde): yul de dag tu gser 'ong ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te/ 
342b1(mdo sde): thos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las/ kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yong su 'dzin pa dang / yongasu sbyong bar bgyid na// bcun
342b2(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yosu
342b3(mdo sde): sbyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyan nas/ dge snyen ma mdo sde'i dbang ba
342b4(mdo sde): rdo dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba tha~Md kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom lda na 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams
342b5(mdo sde): la bde ba'i yo byad tha~Md kyis bde ba dang / yo byad thang phun sum tshogs par gyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam
342b6(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dag la sti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ mi'i rgyal
342b7(mdo sde): po de la rgyal po thad pas ches sti stang du bgyi/ chos bla mar bgyi// ches rim gror bgyi// ches mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan
342b8(mdo sde): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legaso leg so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang leg so// leg so// 'di lta ste/ khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal
343a1(mdo sde): la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas la/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ga chos kyi rgyal ba
343a2(mdo sde): chos kyis lha dang / mi rnams kyis rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste khyed ni yun ring por sems can thaMd la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thaMd la
343a3(mdo sde): phan pa dang bde 'bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa mi phan pa tha~Mng 'gog pa sems can thang la bde ba thaMng nye bar bsgrub par brtson pa yin teto// rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis mi'i rgyal po gtse
343a4(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyangs pa dang / Nad
343a5(mdo sde): pa spang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal/ po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod ste na brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhes 'das pa dang
343a6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung bar yang 'gyuraro// de nas rgyal po chen
343a7(mdo sde): podapung dang g.yog dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa ra rgyal bar 'gyur// lha ma yin rnams 'jam par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar ga
343a8(mdo sde): 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin
343b1(mdo sde): pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po
343b2(mdo sde): chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
343b3(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
343b4(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ta ma kho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyad par 'gyur
343b5(mdo sde): bdang btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang la lazhi ga/ lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bsta/ chos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun tu gser da/ 
343b6(mdo sde): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
343b7(mdo sde): pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror 'gyid cing mcho de/ rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i chu/ chos
343b8(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du mi'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// 
344a1(mdo sde): cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur// bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom
344a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi// dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram
344a3(mdo sde): grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od
344a4(mdo sde): dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa
344a5(mdo sde): spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyab pa dang
344a6(mdo sde): yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu sbyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa thaMd las yongasu thar par bgyi
344a7(mdo sde): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim 'gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid
344a8(mdo sde): de'i dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po bzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig
344b1(mdo sde): tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus
344b2(mdo sde): gra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po nga rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du byin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzang ba yang 'thung bar 'gyur
344b3(mdo sde): yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po rang gi yul du byin na gnang
344b4(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag ba sogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag
344b5(mdo sde): cho ga su mchi ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs pa na lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i nga
344b6(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya
344b7(mdo sde): stong du ma dang / lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar 'gyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// brel ba snatshas
344b8(mdo sde): brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par 'gyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs de mchi ba yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la
345a1(mdo sde): / 'gyur de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la leg so// zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legaso leg so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs
345a2(mdo sde): teng khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgya
345a3(mdo sde): po 'di nyan pa dang / ri mo byed pa dang / mchod pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang // yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi dang bde legasu
345a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu bzung
345a5(mdo sde): dang yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang 'khrug pa thad las yongasu thar
345a6(mdo sde): gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs rnams kyang zlogs shig/ 'jam bu'i gling thang na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po dag mi 'thab pa dang / 'chang mi 'bru ba dang / mi brtsod pa dang / mi
345a7(mdo sde): 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri
345a8(mdo sde): bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang / rang gis nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / 
345b1(mdo sde): gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jigs par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi
345b2(mdo sde): gnod pa dag/ nem 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i semasu 'gyur// byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sam
345b3(mdo sde): su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab mtshang mi 'bru mi brtsod mi 'gyed par rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po phung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi/ 'dzam bu'i gling
345b4(mdo sde): 'di rgyas par 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang la
345b5(mdo sde): khyud khor zad kyang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gaH'dang rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus
345b6(mdo sde): dusu 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling zad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thang 'byor par 'gyur/ longasu spyod che ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur gtong ba dang ldan pa
345b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyo bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar
345b8(mdo sde): 'gyur// rgyal po chen po gang dag la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong
346a1(mdo sde): // dmang dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed// mchod pa byed cing rgyal po che
346a2(mdo sde): po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma la snying rtse ba'i phyir// rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na// chos mnyan pa'i chu
346a3(mdo sde): klung bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis khyed cig lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyuraro// khyed kyis lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po yang rnam par 'phe'o// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang / stobs
346a4(mdo sde): / kyang skyed/ khyod gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phe'o// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
346a5(mdo sde): thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsams gyis mi khyab pa rgya che na po yangs pa byas par 'gyur// mi'i rgyal po des ngas pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
346a6(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma la yang / yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur// des na mi'i
346a7(mdo sde): rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongasu bsgrub pa dang / yong su gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang 'di leg su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur// btsun ma dam pa dang
346a8(mdo sde): rgyal bu rnams dang // btsun mo'i 'khor tha~Mng dang / rgyal po'i 'o brang 'khor thad kyang bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yong su bzung ba dang // yong su bskyang ba dang / da
346b1(mdo sde): pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'o brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thad kyang ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang
346b2(mdo sde): yid bde ba bsam gyis khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/ yongasu bskyangs par
346b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ gnod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs tha~Md kyis mi brdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'i stsal ba dang
346b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig me bzang de dag gis 'di skad
346b5(mdo sde): ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar 'gyur// bdag nyid la yang srung
346b6(mdo sde): ba chen po 'gyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'chel bar
346b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thang la yang zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa bla na med pa bgyid 'chal bar gyur/ tshe'
346b8(mdo sde): la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi
347a1(mdo sde): // po dpag tum mchis pa yong su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur// bdag gi tha kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar gyur/ yongasu bskyang 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa da
347a2(mdo sde): dgra ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po
347a3(mdo sde): des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di sti stang du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi'o// gser
